name: Lights out! (MarcBurner)
description:
Hello and welcome!, You're gonna need sound for this game.

Press left to go left press right, to go right, press the spacebar to jump, and the "ctrl" key to punch.

you have get to the end of the level. But, Oh no you won't be able to see!

I can identify what's coming up so I'll tell you exactly what to do, listen to me an you might make it
Whenever I see an obstacle close by, I'll tell you what it is and what to do.
